ResourceHeader.ResourceName: AJ4CO Terminated Folded Dipole and FS-200B Radio Spectrograph system
ResourceHeader.Description:
Terminated Folded Dipole and FS-200B Radio Spectrograph system at the AJ4CO Radio Astronomy
   Observatory in High Springs, Florida.
The TFD array consists of two 4-element (32 foot) square array. Each
antenna element is 32 feet long. Polarization is simulataneous RCP
and LCP. TFD array is aligned to true north. The FS-200B Radio Spectrograph
operates at 16 - 26 MHz either RCP or LCP.
   
   See the Information URL for a link to a document providing
   additional descriptions of the instrument characteristics.

InformationURL.Name: RadioJOVE Spectrograph Users Group
InformationURL.Description: This site provide station diagrams and other reports for the receiver systems at several radio observatories associated with the RadioJOVE project.

InformationURL.Name: AJ4CO Miscellaneous Data
InformationURL.Description:
This site provides descriptions of radio receiver
